thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.ca
thread.title: Kailyn Nutt

author: Kailyn Nutt
title: Kailyn Nutt
text:
We received our flash drives right on time, and they looked just as they did in the proofs. They work great and look great, so we're happy.
More important than the quality of the product, is the quality of customer service I received. Our account Manager, Nick, was incredibly attentive and paid close attention to detail. He was quick to respond, personable, and very helpful in navigating through the purchasing process without being at all pushy. Customer service is the make-or-break point of a sale, and Nick definitely made it!
